config.script:
# Get all the parameters we need to delete
	
	step_type_id 		= self.view.params.rowData['id']
	step_number 	= self.view.params.rowData['step_number']

	txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)

	try:
	
		# Delete Trend
		namedQuery = "CIP_Q/DB_Delete/Delete_Step"
		parameters = {
			'step_type_id':			step_type_id,
			'step_number':			step_number
		}
		
		affected_rows = system.db.runNamedQuery(system.project.getProjectName(), namedQuery, parameters,tx=txId)
		
		system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
                        			
		# Update the table with lines 
		system.perspective.sendMessage("update_bindings", payload = {}, scope = "page")

		CORE_P.Utils.showSuccess(self, self.view.params.rowData['id']) 
		
		self.props.value=0


	except:
		system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
		self.props.value=0
		CORE_P.Utils.errorPopup('Error deleting Step:') #  + str(sys.exc_info())
